Edwards Guzmán (born September 11, 1976) is a former Major League Baseball player who is currently the manager in the Puerto Rico Baseball League for the Gigantes de Carolina. He also serves as a scout for the Chicago Cubs.
A catcher and infielder, Guzmán played for the San Francisco Giants and Montreal Expos.
